name: Arduino Uno R3
description: The Arduino Uno R3 is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega328P. Perfect for beginners and professionals alike.

name: Raspberry Pi 4 Model B
description: Complete desktop computer in a compact form factor. 8GB RAM variant with WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Breadboard 830 Points
description: Half-size solderless breadboard with 830 tie points. Essential for prototyping electronic circuits.

name: LED Strip 5050 RGB
description: 5-meter waterproof RGB LED strip with remote control. Perfect for ambient lighting projects.

name: Servo Motor SG90
description: Micro servo motor with 180-degree rotation. Ideal for robotics and automation projects.

name: Ultrasonic Sensor HC-SR04
description: Non-contact distance measurement sensor with 2cm to 400cm range. Great for robotics applications.

name: Jumper Wires Set
description: 120-piece jumper wire set with male-to-male, male-to-female, and female-to-female connectors.

name: DC Motor 12V
description: High-torque 12V DC motor with 300 RPM. Perfect for robotics and mechanical projects.

name: OLED Display 0.96"
description: 128x64 pixel OLED display module with I2C interface. Crystal clear text and graphics display.

name: Power Supply Module
description: Adjustable DC power supply module 1.25V-30V with current limiting protection.

name: ESP32 Development Board
description: WiFi and Bluetooth enabled microcontroller with built-in antenna. Perfect for IoT projects.

name: Temperature Sensor DHT22
description: Digital temperature and humidity sensor with high accuracy and long-term stability.
